column2:
noun
  1. Garo people, especially the ones who live in Garo Hills.

noun
  1. The Garo language
  2. The Indian dialects of Garo

pron
  1. which, which of several (of people or things)

postp
  1. (follows locative case -cha) side, position, in the direction of
  2. part, section

verb
  1. (intransitive) to fly (of both animate and inanimate entities)
  2. (intransitive) to jump
  3. (transitive) to dig out (e.g. tubers)
  4. to uncover

verb
  1. (of seeds and plants) to grow, to germinate

verb
  1. to put on the fire, have on the fire (of a cooking pot)
  2. to count
  3. to track, follow the tracks (as when hunting animals)

verb
  1. to put a pot on the fire

noun
  1. spring, stream, pond, place where water is obtained from

noun
  1. well of the type that has a handpump

noun
  1. water channel leading to or from rice fields

noun
  1. a large, round, open-mouthed earthenware pot, used for brewing rice beer

postp
  1. (follows augmented locative -oni). since
  2. (follows augmented locative -ona). until, up to, as long as

verb
  1. there is, there are
  2. to have, belong, be at, reside, dwell
  3. be married to

noun
  1. a raised earthen platform forming a fireplace in an old-style house

noun
  1. platform for an old-style bamboo house, platform for sleeping made from boards of bamboo

postp
  1. (follows genitive case -ni) because of, due to

noun
  1. a small narrow-bladed hoe, for weeding and digging up roots

noun
  1. (anatomy) rib bone
  2. (botany) side vein of a leaf

noun
  1. low place between hills, (wider than a ha·singsep (valley))

noun
  1. (anatomy) palm of the hand, end of an insect leg

verb
  1. to divorce, lit. to get rid of one's wife

verb
  1. care for, support, have responsibility for (E.g. children, old people, animals)

verb
  1. (intransitive) to be ill, suffer, have a fever

verb
  1. to tie, tie with string or flexible bamboo strips
  2. to put on, wear a turban
  3. to build by tying (of a fence, barrier in streams)
  4. to make friends

noun
  1. (anatomy) front of the body
  2. breast of a bird

verb
  1. to lessen, reduce, come down (as a price)

noun
  1. a lungi, a garment wrapped around the waist

verb
  1. to be able, can
  2. find, get, accomplish, achieve, finish

postp
  1. (follows genitive case -ni) because, on account of, for that reason

verb
  1. to name, call by one's personal name (as opposed to one's family name)

noun
  1. cork, plug, cap, screw-top of a bottle

verb
  1. enter, go in, come in
  2. set (of the sun and moon)

noun
  1. house
  2. classifier for families, households, for what is held in a house.

noun
  1. house site, place where a house can be built

postp
  1. (follows genitive case -ni) because, on account of

noun
  1. fig tree, especially mock bodh tree (Ficus rumphii)

verb
  1. return, go back, come back
  2. transform, shape-shift (to transform and return back)

verb
  1. to cover with, spread over (as a blanket, thatch etc.)

noun
  1. ladle made from a gourd (used especially for rice beer)

verb
  1. to be bright, to be hard

noun
  1. the name of an alphabet in Garo, symbolised by a dot or apostrophe representing the glottal stop.

noun
  1. road, way, path
  2. means

verb
  1. to spread (so that the object(s) dry in the sun)

noun
  1. rice seedling after removal from seedbed or after transplanting

verb
  1. to mate (of animals)
  2. to dance

noun
  1. earthenware storage pot with no neck and a large mouth, used to store rice
  2. the thick part at the base of a banana trunk

noun
  1. axe
  2. rice seedling after removal from seedbed or after transplanting

verb
  1. to pour slowly and carefully
  2. to take down; to take apart
  3. to mate (of animals)
  4. to dance

noun
  1. sun, day, daytime
  2. a 24 hour period
  3. weather
  4. classifier for days

noun
  1. grass; herb
  2. medicine
  3. curry

classifier
  1. used with any bilateral body part, hands, eyes, etc.

verb
  1. to divorce, lit. to get rid of one's husband

verb
  1. to live, to settle in a village

verb
  1. (transitive) to measure the length, weight
  2. (intransitive) to be nice.
  3. to be delicious

noun
  1. fig tree, especially mock bodh tree (Ficus rumphii)
